meanings.definition: To join or attach with glue.
meanings.sent1: I am glueing the pieces together.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried glueing its toy mouse back together.
meanings.sent4: His words had a way of glueing themselves to my memory.
meanings.sent5: The idea of friendship glueing us like family is heartwarming.

meanings.definition: The act of using glue to join or attach things together.
meanings.sent1: Glueing is important for making models.
meanings.sent2: I ran out of glueing during my art project.
meanings.sent3: The glueing of the puzzle pieces was a messy affair.
meanings.sent4: The glueing of the broken vase brought it back to life.
meanings.sent5: The glueing of the stars on the ceiling made it feel like a night sky.
